name: Big banner
help: You can display a big image to promote for example a new product, some product features, campaigns or whatever you need in a highlighted big image.

image_desktop.name: Image (desktop)
image_desktop.help: Minimum recommended size for width is 1110px. If you use 'Full size' the minimum recommended width is 1980px.

link_text.name: Link text
link_text.help: Text that displays when hovering over the banner.
